name: Christopher Williams
body:
# Contact Me
If you wish to contact me please email [contact@christopherwilliams.me](mailto:contact@christopherwilliams.me).

***

# Projects (in chronological order)

## [Micronaut](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/micronaut/id1052986322)
### January - June 2016
* Platformer video game written in Swift for Apple TV
* Cal Poly Senior Project
![Micronaut App Icon](http://a2.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple18/v4/d9/f1/cb/d9f1cbc3-b658-240f-1549-b4a9dd31d943/icon600x600.jpeg)

## [Baaaaalrog](http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/baaaaalrog)
### January 2016
* Top-down goat chucking video game written with libgdx
* Created for GlobalGameJam hack-a-thon event
![Gameplay screenshot of Barlog](http://globalgamejam.org/sites/default/files/styles/game_sidebar__wide_2x/public/game/featured_image/12630956_10208569817303069_675954109_o.jpg?itok=qrdh1d8Y)

## [Japanese Festival](http://retrorebirth.github.io/CPE476_JapaneseFestival/)
### April - June 2015
* Real-time interactive 3D video game with an overworld and several minigames
* Utilized libraries for audio & video playback and text on-screen
![Gameplay screenshot of Barlog](http://globalgamejam.org/sites/default/files/styles/game_sidebar__wide_2x/public/game/featured_image/12630956_10208569817303069_675954109_o.jpg?itok=qrdh1d8Y)

## [Deep Beat](https://users.csc.calpoly.edu/~cwilli45/cpe378_final/DeepBeat/)
### April - June 2015
* Rhythmic rail shooter game written in JavaScript utilizing CreateJS

## [Bunny Shrine](http://retrorebirth.github.io/BunnyShrine/)
### January - March 2015
* Interactive 3D scene of a bunny shrine written in C++ utilizing OpenGL

## [Attack Vector](http://globalgamejam.org/2015/games/%EF%BF%BC%EF%BF%BCattackvector/)
### January 2015
* Infinite maze runner game written in C++ utilizing SFML
* Created for GlobalGameJam hack-a-thon event

## [Stikit](http://calhacks.challengepost.com/submissions/27879-stikit/)
### October 2014
* Android application utilizing Chromecast API and JSON data transfer
* Completed demo-able application within 36 hours
* Created for Cal Hacks hack-a-thon event

***

# Industry Experience

## [Apple _as a_ QA Engineer](http://www.apple.com/)
### July 2016 - _present_
* Contributing to the Interactive Media Group department

## [Treasure _as a_ Software Developer](http://tresureapp.com/)
### October 2015 - June 2016
* Developing an ecommerce iOS app with Swift and API backend with Ruby

## [Apple _as a_ QA Engineer Intern](http://www.apple.com/)
### June - September 2015
* Contributed to the Interactive Media Group department

## [Salesforce (Tempo AI) _as a_ Software Developer](http://www.tempo.ai/)
### Feburary 2014 - May 2015
* Developed Android application in a team of 8 software engineers
* Tempo AI was acquired by Salesforce in May 2015

## [Tapestry Solutions _as a_ Software Developer](http://www.tapestrysolutions.com/)
### November 2012 - Feburary 2014
* Developed desktop software with Adobe Flex UI and PostgreSQL databases

***

# Education

## [California Polytechnic San Luis Obispo](http://www.calpoly.edu/)
* September 2012 - June 2016
* Achieved Computer Science BS with a GPA of 3.2
* Dean's List : Fall 2012, Spring 2013, Fall 2015
* Focused on Real-Time 3D Graphics, User Design, Security, HCI, OS, and Networks

***

# Leadership

## [SLO GLO President](http://sloglo.com/)
* Schedule and run officer meetings, coordinate events, and delegated tasks
